I'm a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, causal inference, and programming in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.



A former PhD student at the [Department of Political Science (UCPH)](https://politicalscience.ku.dk), I currently work as a consultant/analyst/data scientist for a private Danish consultancy firm.

Recently, I've been focusing on spatial data analysis üó∫Ô∏è, data visualization &#128202;, and sports analytics &#9917;.

* Have a look at some of my various data visualizations &#128202; [here](https://github.com/jvieroe/dataviz) and my [TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) commits &#128200; [here](https://github.com/jvieroe/TidyTuesday)
* I have also published (or am working on) a few <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i> packages &#128230;
